---
name: github-community-health
description: Bootstrap and maintain GitHub community health files and templates in supported locations.
---

# GitHub Community Health

## Supported files (typical)

- README
- LICENSE
- CODE_OF_CONDUCT
- CONTRIBUTING
- SUPPORT
- SECURITY
- issue templates/forms
- pull request template
- CODEOWNERS

## Locations

Prefer `.github/` in the repository for repository-specific files.

## Output

- file list + locations
- minimal content that is high-signal
